definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset

sentences.english: Good tea needs good cooking water. Around 100 meters away from Yanxia Tea House, there is the "Tiefo Spring."
sentences.chinese: 好茶需好水，距离烟霞茶院约百米处，有“铁佛泉”。

sentences.english: Or haze, you know, it'll go away pretty quickly.
sentences.chinese: 烟霞，你知道，它也会很快消失。

sentences.english: Easterly winds strengthened. Haze drifted west away from Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 东风增强，烟霞随风向西飘离香港。

sentences.english: My independence seems to vanish in the haze.
sentences.chinese: 我国独立似乎消失在烟霞。

sentences.english: Stare at the black dot. Where does the gray haze go?
sentences.chinese: 盯着黑点。灰色的烟霞在哪儿？

sentences.english: Lying clouds on the month as a wild, drunken haze from time to time to buy.
sentences.chinese: 对月卧云如野鹿，时时买酒醉烟霞。

sentences.english: Houses on either side of the harbor were still half asleep amid the morning mist.
sentences.chinese: 海港两边的屋子，还在早晨烟霞中半睡着哩。

sentences.english: As such, all give this past year cage with a thick haze.
sentences.chinese: 这样，所有给这一年笼上厚厚的烟霞笼罩着。

definition: the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
